== CI Dashboard ==

The CI Dashboard, <nowiki>[[http://ci.ubuntu.com]]</nowiki>, contains summarized image testing results.

The dashboard includes testing of Ubuntu Touch images. This testing is driven by <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/~ubuntu-test-case-dev/ubuntu-test-cases/touch]]</nowiki>. Developers and testers can use these tools to reproduce the CI testing on a local device. The documentation can be found here:

* <nowiki>[[http://ubuntu-test-cases-touch.readthedocs.org/en/latest/]]</nowiki>

<nowiki>[[CI-Dashboard-Categorization|Image testing failure categorization]]</nowiki>
